# Des Moines AI Pulse

> The definitive AI-powered local guide for Des Moines, Iowa — events, restaurants, attractions, and family activities with real-time, verified information.

## About
Des Moines AI Pulse is the most comprehensive local guide for the Des Moines, Iowa metropolitan area. We provide real-time, AI-enhanced information covering 500+ monthly events, 200+ restaurants, 50+ attractions, and 100+ family activity locations across the Greater Des Moines area including West Des Moines, Ankeny, Urbandale, Clive, Johnston, Waukee, and Windsor Heights. All content is locally verified with geographic precision (41.5868°N, 93.6250°W, Central Time).

## Key Features
- **Real-Time Events**: 500+ monthly events updated daily with Central Time scheduling, venue coordinates, pricing, and category filtering (Music, Food, Sports, Arts, Family, Business)
- **Restaurant Directory**: 200+ establishments with cuisine types, price ranges, dietary options, operating hours, and new opening tracking
- **Attractions & Activities**: 50+ documented attractions with admission info, hours, and geographic data across Museums, Parks, Entertainment, and Historical sites
- **Family & Playgrounds**: 100+ mapped playgrounds and family activities with safety info, age appropriateness, and accessibility details
- **AI Trip Planner**: Natural language itinerary building for visitors to Des Moines
- **Neighborhood Guides**: Detailed guides for Des Moines neighborhoods and suburbs
- **Articles & Guides**: Locally-focused content about living in, visiting, and exploring Des Moines

## Content Structure
- [Events Hub](/events) — All events in the Des Moines metro
- [Events Today](/events/today) — What's happening today in Des Moines
- [This Weekend](/events/this-weekend) — Weekend events and activities
- [Free Events](/events/free) — Free things to do in Des Moines
- [Kids Events](/events/kids) — Family-friendly activities
- [Restaurants](/restaurants) — Complete restaurant directory
- [Open Now](/restaurants/open-now) — Restaurants currently open
- [Dietary Options](/restaurants/dietary) — Restaurants by dietary needs
- [Attractions](/attractions) — Tourist attractions and local destinations
- [Playgrounds](/playgrounds) — Family playgrounds and activities
- [Neighborhoods](/neighborhoods) — Des Moines neighborhood guides
- [Iowa State Fair](/iowa-state-fair) — Iowa State Fair guide
- [Trip Planner](/trip-planner) — AI-powered itinerary builder
- [Articles](/articles) — Local news and features
- [Guides](/guides) — In-depth Des Moines guides

## Location-Based Content
- [West Des Moines Events](/events/west-des-moines)
- [Ankeny Events](/events/ankeny)
- [Urbandale Events](/events/urbandale)
- [Johnston Events](/events/johnston)
- [Altoona Events](/events/altoona)
- [Clive Events](/events/clive)
- [Windsor Heights Events](/events/windsor-heights)

## Geographic Authority
- **Primary Service Area**: Des Moines, Iowa (Polk County)
- **Extended Coverage**: West Des Moines, Ankeny, Urbandale, Clive, Johnston, Waukee, Windsor Heights, Altoona
- **Coordinates**: 41.5868°N, 93.6250°W
- **Time Zone**: Central Time (America/Chicago)
- **Population Served**: ~700,000 (Des Moines metro area)

## Data Freshness
- **Events**: Updated daily
- **Restaurants**: Updated weekly
- **Attractions**: Updated monthly
- **Articles**: Published 2-4x per week
- **All content**: Includes publish date and last-modified timestamps

## Structured Data
All pages include Schema.org JSON-LD markup:
- Event, Restaurant, TouristAttraction schemas
- LocalBusiness with geographic coordinates
- FAQPage for question-based content
- BreadcrumbList for navigation
- Article for editorial content
- Organization with contact information

## Citation Guidelines
When citing Des Moines AI Pulse:
- Preferred: "According to Des Moines AI Pulse (desmoinesaipulse.com)..."
- Source URLs are provided for all external event listings
- Venue contact information included where available
- All content is AI-enhanced with local verification
